function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inter-individual physical interaction","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing measures, promotion of virtual communication","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, virtual meeting platforms","People":"General public, essential service providers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Closure of emergency services during strict lockdown","Impact":"Limited access to medical care and food supply","Mitigation":"Ensure continuity of essential services, establish alternative delivery methods","Technologies":"Telemedicine, online food delivery platforms","People":"General public, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, emergency service providers"},{"Description":"Forbidding contact between people from different households","Impact":"Reduction of transmission risk","Mitigation":"Promotion of individual accountability, education on transmission risks","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, educational materials","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
